item.title: Talks
item.description: Talks Upcoming Talks Privacy-preserving models using Federated Learning Federated learning is a family of Machine Learning algorithms that has the core idea: a connected network exists in which there is a central server node. Each of the nodes creates data – that has to be used for training as well as for prediction. Each of the nodes trains a local model and only that model is shared with the server, not the data.

item.title: Workshops
item.description: Workshops Upcoming Workshops Recommendation Systems using Deep Learning Recommendation systems play a significant role—for users, a new world of options; for companies, it drives engagement and satisfaction. We walk you through the different paradigms of recommendation systems and introduce you to deep learning-based approaches. You'll gain the practical hands-on knowledge to build, select, deploy, and maintain a recommendation system. More info Details Venue: CA, USA Date: March 2020
